article_title: The Top Ten Tax Cases (And Rulings) Of 2014: #1-Obamacare Endures Additional Attacks

article_metadata.author: Tony Nitti

og.description: It's finally over. The October 15th tax deadline is behind us, which means for tax practitioners, our return filings are mercifully finished for the year. Unless of course, you chose to make your career in the not-for-profit world, in which case you deserve the extra month of misery. On October 16th, thousands of tax preparers [...]
